name: STAKE ME | Binance Smart Chain Staking DApp with Smart Contracts
content:
Overview

STAKE ME is a robust decentralized application (DApp) designed for crypto projects seeking to offer token staking services on their platforms. This DApp, crafted with sophisticated smart contract functionality, allows for integration either as a subdomain or directly onto existing websites. It offers projects the flexibility to set their own Return on Investment (ROI) and designate specific staking durations for their tokens.

Key Features:

  • Customizable Staking Options: Platform owners can set desired ROIs and determine staking periods, tailoring the service to the project's strategic goals.

  • Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrates with existing websites or operates as a standalone subdomain, providing versatility in deployment.

  • Enhanced User Interface: Features a beautifully designed UI that enhances user experience while maintaining ease of use and accessibility.

  • Optimized Smart Contracts: Utilizes optimized smart contracts on the Binance Smart Chain for secure and efficient transaction processing.

  • Flexible Vesting Periods: Supports multiple vesting periods, allowing users to choose from 30, 60, 90, or 120 days, aligning with different investment strategies.

  • Real-time Reward Calculation: The smart contract calculates rewards in real-time, ensuring transparency and accuracy in reward payouts.

Smart Contract Mechanisms:

  • Efficient Staking Protocol: Users can stake their tokens by transferring them to the smart contract, which then tracks the staking duration and calculates the rewards based on the set daily ROI.

  • Dynamic ROI Setting: Platform owners have the ability to adjust the daily ROI, with safeguards to ensure it remains within a reasonable range to prevent unsustainable promises.

  • Reward Distribution: Rewards are accumulated and can be claimed by the user at the end of the vesting period, with the smart contract handling all calculations and transfers.

  • Security Features: Includes functions to prevent staking of zero tokens and ensures that tokens can only be unstaked after the completion of the vesting period.

Ideal For: Crypto projects looking to engage their community by offering staking rewards, or startups wanting to add staking functionalities to their existing platforms without the need for extensive backend development.

name: Ethereum volume trading bot
content:
Ethereum Volume Bot – Full Feature List

Trading & Strategy Configuration

* Set Buy Range: Define minimum and maximum buy price range to automate entries.

* Set Sell Range: Customize sell thresholds for take-profit or stop-loss strategies.

* Slippage Control: Adjustable slippage settings to prevent unfavorable trades.

* Buy/Sell Ratio Settings: Set more aggressive buying or selling patterns depending on strategy.

* Gap Between Transactions: Time delay or transaction spacing to mimic organic activity.

* Set Token Price via Buys/Sells: Dynamically set or influence token price using controlled buys/sells.

* Custom Trade Amounts: Adjust individual or grouped buy/sell volumes.

* Gas Fee Customization: Set preferred gas prices (standard, fast, rapid) per transaction.

* Gas Limit Control: Customize gas limits for optimized execution.

* Trade Token Address Setting: Easily set or update target token address for trading.

* Private/Fast Node Integration: Option to use your own private node or fast public node for faster execution.

* Set RPC/Node URL: Integrate any RPC endpoint for reliability and speed.

Wallet & Fund Management

* Wallet Generator: Automatically generate and manage multiple wallets for transactions.

* Token Collection: Aggregate all specific tokens from multiple wallets into a central wallet.

* ETH Collection: Collect all ETH from all connected wallets into a single address.

* Token Distribution: Distribute tokens evenly or by custom ratio to multiple wallets.

* ETH Distribution: Distribute ETH to all wallets to fund gas fees or start trading.

* Wallet Balancing: Auto-balance ETH or token amounts across all wallets.

* Dead Wallet Detection: Monitor wallets for inactivity or failed transactions.

* Multi-Wallet Control Panel: Central dashboard to view, control, and manage all wallets.

Automation & Scheduling

* Auto-Restart on Failure: Bot can auto-restart on transaction error or disconnect.

* Scheduled Buys/Sells: Schedule trades to mimic real user behavior over time.

* Trigger-Based Trades: Execute trades based on price, volume, or external triggers (e.g., news).

* Anti-Bot Detection: Mimics organic human behavior to avoid detection by DEXs or token contracts.

Analytics & Reporting

* Live Trade Logs: Real-time updates of all trades with Tx hash and status.

* Wallet Balance Tracking: View balances across all wallets in real-time.

* Profit & Loss Calculator: Calculates PnL per wallet and aggregated totals.

* Token Price Feed Integration: Use live oracles or DEX feeds to monitor token prices.

* Volume Simulation Dashboard: Visualize how trades impact token volume and chart activity.

Security & Access Control

* Encrypted Wallet Storage: All private keys and seed phrases stored securely.

* Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA): Secure access to bot settings and control panel.

* Permission-Based Roles: Grant access levels to team members (admin, viewer, operator).

* Fail-Safe Stop Function: Emergency stop button halts all activity instantly.

Advanced Features

* Front-Running Protection: Ensures your transaction is prioritized without being exploited.

* Token Liquidity Detection: Bot checks for sufficient liquidity before executing large trades.

* Dust Token Filtering: Ignores small, irrelevant token balances.

* Auto-Token Approval: Automatically approves tokens for trading before buy/sell execution.

* Buy/Sell Confirmation Delay: Option to add human-like delays before confirming trades.

* Multichain Support (Optional): Expand bot functionality to other EVM-compatible chains like BSC, Polygon, AVAX.

* Telegram/Discord Notifications: Get real-time updates of trades and errors via bots.

* Webhook & API Support: Trigger bot actions via external tools, trading platforms, or scripts.

name: Solana volume trading bot
content:
Solana Volume Bot – Complete Feature Overview

This bot is designed to simulate organic trading volume on Solana tokens by managing multiple wallets, automating buys and sells, and optimizing transaction flow. It is ideal for market-making, chart activity simulation, and token promotion.

Trading and Volume Simulation Settings

  • Set Buy Range (Min/Max): Configure minimum and maximum SOL buy amounts per transaction to simulate varied trading behavior.

  • Set Sell Range (Min/Max): Control token selling ranges to generate exit activity or liquidity movement.

  • Slippage Control: Define max slippage for safe trades using Solana DEXs like Raydium, Orca, or Jupiter Aggregator.

  • Adjustable Buy/Sell Ratio: Control the ratio of buys to sells (e.g., 70% buys and 30% sells) to mimic bullish or bearish behavior.

  • Gap Between Transactions: Set time delays or randomized intervals between each wallet's activity to imitate human-like behavior.

  • Trade Frequency Control: Schedule how often each wallet performs a trade—by minute, hour, or custom intervals.

  • Token Address Input: Set the SPL token address to trade against SOL.

  • DEX Selection: Choose which DEX to trade on (Raydium, Orca, Meteora, Phoenix, etc.).

Transaction and Fee Settings

  • Priority Fee Customization: Set compute unit prices and additional priority fees for faster transaction confirmation.

  • Gas Optimization (CU Limit): Adjust compute units per transaction for performance and fee control.

  • Custom Slippage Per Trade: Change slippage settings dynamically for each wallet or trade.

Wallet and Fund Management

  • Multi-Wallet Generator: Instantly generate and manage hundreds or thousands of wallets with private key or mnemonic backup.

  • SOL Funding and Distribution: Automatically send SOL to each wallet for gas and trade execution.

  • Token Distribution: Distribute tokens across wallets to prepare for sell-side simulation.

  • Token Collection: Collect all SPL tokens from multiple wallets to a central wallet address.

  • SOL Collection: Sweep leftover SOL from all wallets to your main wallet.

  • Balance Monitor: Real-time check of token and SOL balances across all wallets.

  • Dead Wallet Detection: Automatically flags wallets with failed transactions or zero balance for clean-up.

Analytics and Volume Control

  • Live Trade Logging: See detailed logs of each trade including amount, wallet, timestamp, and transaction hash.

  • Total Volume Tracker: Track cumulative buy and sell volume across all wallets and timeframes.

  • Wallet Performance Overview: Visual dashboard of individual wallet behavior (volume, success rate, profit and loss).

  • Simulated Price Impact Display: View how trade simulation affects token chart or pool on the DEX.

Security and Control

  • Encrypted Wallet Storage: All private keys and mnemonics are securely encrypted.

  • Emergency Stop Function: Instantly halt all bot operations across all wallets.

  • Access Permissions (Role-Based): Set admin, operator, or viewer roles for team-based projects.

  • Auto-Restart on Error: Bot restarts automatically on transaction failure or RPC timeout.

Automation and AI Add-ons (Optional)

  • Auto Adjust Buy/Sell Ratio Based on Volume Trend: Bot adjusts buy and sell ratio based on 24-hour or 7-day market movement.

  • Trending Token Scanner (On-Chain): Scan for trending tokens based on social sentiment or volume spike.

  • Telegram Bot Integration: Get real-time alerts on wallet trades, errors, and performance stats.

  • Webhook and API Triggers: Integrate with other platforms or use as part of a larger automation system.

Node and Network Configuration

  • Set Custom RPC Nodes: Use public, private, or paid Solana RPCs for improved performance.

  • Auto Node Switching: Automatically switches RPC endpoint on timeout or congestion.

  • Fast Node Selection: Choose the fastest available node for trading at high frequency.

Additional Features

  • Simulated Organic Volume Patterns: Pre-built presets to simulate human-like trading behavior (whale, retail, bot mix).

  • Multi-Token Trading: Simultaneously simulate volume for multiple SPL tokens with separate configurations.

  • Token Chart Pumper Mode: Rapid buy sequences to simulate bullish chart movement in a short time frame.

  • Dust Filter: Ignore negligible token balances to reduce transaction count.

Liquidity Check Before Trade: Prevents trade execution if there is insufficient liquidity on the target DEX pool.

name: Binance volume trading bot
content:
BSC Volume Bot – Complete Feature Overview

This bot is designed to simulate trading volume on BSC tokens by automating buy and sell transactions across multiple wallets. It is commonly used for chart activity simulation, market-making, and token visibility on platforms like PancakeSwap and DEXTools.

Trading and Volume Simulation Settings

  • Set Buy Range (Min/Max): Configure minimum and maximum BNB buy amounts per transaction to create varied volume behavior.

  • Set Sell Range (Min/Max): Control token selling ranges to simulate organic exit activity.

  • Slippage Control: Define acceptable slippage levels for trades on PancakeSwap or other DEXs.

  • Adjustable Buy and Sell Ratio: Set ratios like 80% buys and 20% sells to simulate bullish volume or vice versa.

  • Gap Between Transactions: Add time delays or randomized intervals between trades for natural activity.

  • Trade Frequency Control: Set how often each wallet trades (per minute, hourly, or custom).

  • Token Address Input: Set the BEP-20 token contract address to trade.

  • DEX Selection: Choose DEX like PancakeSwap, BakerySwap, or others for trade execution.

Transaction and Fee Settings

  • Gas Price Customization: Adjust gas price (Gwei) for faster or cheaper transaction speeds.

  • Gas Limit Control: Set custom gas limits per transaction to ensure successful trade execution.

  • Slippage Per Trade: Modify slippage per wallet or per transaction for flexibility.

Wallet and Fund Management

  • Multi-Wallet Generator: Generate and manage large batches of wallets with private keys or seed phrases.

  • BNB Distribution: Distribute BNB to each wallet for gas fees and trading.

  • Token Distribution: Send tokens to wallets for sell-side simulation.

  • Token Collection: Collect BEP-20 tokens from all wallets to a central address.

  • BNB Collection: Gather leftover BNB from wallets to your main wallet.

  • Balance Monitoring: View BNB and token balances across all wallets in real-time.

  • Dead Wallet Detection: Automatically identify wallets with failed transactions or no balance.

Analytics and Volume Control

  • Live Trade Logging: Real-time logs for each buy or sell including amount, wallet used, and transaction hash.

  • Total Volume Tracker: Track cumulative buy and sell volume across all wallets and time periods.

  • Wallet Performance Tracking: Overview of activity and results per wallet.

  • Simulated Price Impact Monitoring: Estimate and display how trades affect token price on DEX charts.

Security and Control

  • Encrypted Wallet Storage: Safely store private keys and mnemonic phrases.

  • Emergency Stop: Instantly pause all trading operations in case of error or update.

  • Access Control: Assign admin, operator, or viewer roles to team members.

  • Auto-Restart on Transaction Failure: Automatically retry or restart bot on error or timeout.

Automation and Smart Features (Optional)

  • Auto Adjust Buy and Sell Ratio: Change buy and sell ratio based on token performance or market trend.

  • Trending Token Detection: Detect trending tokens based on volume, mentions, or new pairs.

  • Telegram Notifications: Receive alerts for trades, failures, or key activity via Telegram bot.

  • Webhook and API Integration: Trigger bot actions through third-party systems or automations.

Node and Network Configuration

  • Custom RPC Support: Use private or public BSC nodes to ensure fast and reliable trading.

  • Auto-Switch RPC: Automatically changes to a backup node in case of delay or failure.

  • Node Speed Control: Choose the fastest node for minimal latency.

Additional Features

  • Pre-Set Trading Behavior: Choose from predefined trading strategies such as aggressive buyer, slow and steady, or mixed.

  • Multi-Token Support: Trade multiple BEP-20 tokens simultaneously using independent settings.

  • Chart Push Mode: Execute fast consecutive buys to simulate bullish chart movement.

  • Dust Token Filter: Ignore tiny leftover balances to reduce unnecessary transactions.

  • Liquidity Check: Ensures enough liquidity exists on PancakeSwap before executing trades.

Token Approval Automation: Auto-approve tokens before making the first sell trade.

name: Tron volume trading bot
content:
TRON Volume Bot – Complete Feature Overview

This bot is designed to simulate organic trading volume for TRC-20 tokens on the TRON blockchain. It automates buy and sell transactions across multiple wallets to help drive token visibility, simulate chart activity, and enhance market presence on DEXs like SunSwap.

Trading and Volume Simulation Settings

  • Set buy range (min/max): Define the minimum and maximum TRX amount to be used for each buy transaction

  • Set sell range (min/max): Customize sell amounts to simulate controlled token sell-offs

  • Slippage control: Configure allowed slippage to avoid failed transactions on SunSwap or other TRON DEXs

  • Adjustable buy and sell ratio: Set how many wallets are buying vs selling (e.g., 70% buy, 30% sell)

  • Gap between transactions: Add random or fixed delays between trades to simulate human activity

  • Trade frequency control: Set how often each wallet should trade (minutes, hourly, etc.)

  • Token address input: Input the TRC-20 token contract address to simulate volume on

  • DEX selection: Choose target DEX like SunSwap or others supported on TRON

Transaction and Fee Settings

  • Energy and bandwidth usage: Automatically manage or use staked resources to reduce transaction costs

  • Fee adjustment: Option to cover TRX transaction fees automatically for all wallets

  • Slippage per trade: Set different slippage values per wallet or per transaction

  • Auto stake/unstake: Optional management of TRX staking for energy savings

Wallet and Fund Management

  • Multi-wallet generator: Generate and manage multiple TRON wallets with private key or mnemonic access

  • TRX distribution: Send TRX to each wallet to fund trading and transaction fees

  • Token distribution: Distribute TRC-20 tokens across wallets for sell-side simulation

  • Token collection: Collect all tokens from trading wallets into a central wallet

  • TRX collection: Sweep remaining TRX from all wallets to a main wallet

  • Balance monitoring: Monitor wallet balances of TRX and tokens in real time

  • Dead wallet detection: Identify and skip wallets with no balance or failed transactions

Analytics and Volume Control

  • Live trade logs: Record all trades with transaction ID, wallet used, amount, and status

  • Volume tracker: Display total trading volume simulated across all wallets

  • Wallet activity overview: View individual wallet trade history and token movement

  • Simulated price impact: Estimate how trades affect token price and liquidity pool behavior

Security and Control

  • Encrypted wallet storage: Keep all private keys and seed phrases securely stored

  • Emergency stop: Instantly stop all trading activity across all wallets

  • Access roles: Assign user roles such as admin, viewer, or operator

  • Auto-retry on failure: Automatically reattempt trades or reset stuck transactions

Automation and Smart Features (Optional)

  • Auto buy/sell ratio adjustment: Dynamically change buy/sell ratio based on market conditions

  • Token trend detection: Monitor on-chain activity to detect trending TRC-20 tokens

  • Telegram notifications: Receive instant alerts for trades, errors, or key metrics

  • Webhook/API integration: Connect the bot with external apps or custom automation systems

Node and Network Configuration

  • Custom TRON node setup: Connect to your own TRON full node or use public nodes

  • Auto node switching: Change nodes automatically if one fails or lags

  • Fast node selection: Use the lowest-latency node for faster trade execution

Additional Features

  • Preset trading patterns: Choose from default behaviors like steady buys, aggressive sells, or whale simulation

  • Multi-token support: Simulate volume for multiple TRC-20 tokens with independent settings

  • Chart push mode: Create temporary bullish charts with fast consecutive buys

  • Dust filtering: Ignore tiny token balances to avoid wasting bandwidth and fees

  • Liquidity check: Confirm token liquidity before trade execution

  • Auto token approval: Automatically approve tokens before selling them on DEX

name: Base chain volume trading bot
content:
Base Chain Volume Bot – Complete Feature Overview

This bot is built to simulate organic trading activity on tokens deployed on the Base chain. It automates buys and sells across multiple wallets, helping projects generate visible volume, chart activity, and improved market perception on DEXs like Uniswap (Base) or Aerodrome.

Trading and Volume Simulation Settings

  • Set buy range (min/max): Define the minimum and maximum ETH buy amount per transaction

  • Set sell range (min/max): Set custom sell amounts to simulate natural sell pressure

  • Slippage control: Define acceptable slippage for each trade to avoid failed or front-run transactions

  • Adjustable buy/sell ratio: Control how many wallets are buying vs selling (e.g., 60% buys and 40% sells)

  • Gap between transactions: Add randomized or fixed delay between trades for organic timing

  • Trade frequency control: Schedule trades per wallet by minute, hour, or custom intervals

  • Token address input: Set the Base chain token (ERC-20) address to trade

  • DEX selection: Choose from supported DEXs like Uniswap (Base), Aerodrome, or others

Transaction and Fee Settings

  • Custom gas price: Set desired priority gas fees for faster confirmation

  • Gas limit control: Adjust gas limits to ensure successful trade execution

  • Slippage per trade: Customize slippage on a per-wallet or per-trade basis

Wallet and Fund Management

  • Multi-wallet generator: Create and manage multiple wallets with private key or seed phrase backup

  • ETH distribution: Automatically send ETH to each wallet to cover gas and trading costs

  • Token distribution: Send tokens to wallets for sell-side simulation

  • Token collection: Consolidate all tokens from multiple wallets to a main address

  • ETH collection: Sweep leftover ETH from all wallets to your main wallet

  • Balance monitor: View live ETH and token balances for all connected wallets

  • Dead wallet detection: Automatically identify wallets with failed activity or no balance

Analytics and Volume Control

  • Live trade logs: See transaction history in real time, including wallet, type, amount, and TX hash

  • Volume tracker: View total buy and sell volume across all wallets

  • Wallet-level tracking: Monitor how much each wallet has bought, sold, and current balances

  • Simulated price impact: Estimate how trades are affecting token charts and DEX liquidity

Security and Control

  • Encrypted wallet storage: Keep all private keys and seeds securely stored

  • Emergency stop: Instantly pause all bot activity in case of error or manual stop

  • Access control: Define roles like admin, operator, or viewer for team usage

  • Auto-restart on error: Automatically retries trades or restarts bot when issues are detected

Automation and Smart Features (Optional)

  • Auto-adjust buy/sell ratio: Change buy/sell behavior based on token volume or trend

  • Trending token detection: Track Base tokens trending on DEXTools or social mentions

  • Telegram alerts: Receive real-time alerts for trade activity or bot issues

  • Webhook/API support: Trigger bot activity via external systems or custom scripts

Node and Network Configuration

  • Custom RPC support: Connect your own Base RPC node (public or private)

  • Auto RPC failover: Switch to backup node in case of error or congestion

  • Node performance selection: Use the fastest node for low-latency trading

Additional Features

  • Pre-built trading modes: Use presets like whale behavior, retail flow, or mixed activity

  • Multi-token trading: Simultaneously simulate volume on multiple Base tokens

  • Chart push mode: Rapid buy sequences to simulate bullish momentum

  • Dust filtering: Skip tiny token balances to avoid unnecessary gas usage

  • Liquidity check: Confirm DEX liquidity before executing a buy or sell

  • Auto token approval: Automatically approve tokens for trading before first sell
